reviewText: Loved this movie when I was little and now I'm so glad I can show it to my nieces and nephews!

Amidst the dumbed down, shallow and pointless commercial garbage so often aimed at children, this piece reminds me of what TV as a medium is capable of. The animation and music are beautifully crafted to work together and the whole tale unfolds without a single line of dialogue uttered. A timeless classic.
My four kids loved this movie growing up.  The youngest is now 11 and our VHS tape of the movie broke.  I found the movie on Amazon and now my granddaughter is hooked on it.

I found this book as a young mother for my kids. It has no words so it is a story everybody can interpret on their own, Even kids who cannot read! A fantastic story of Love and Courage for all ages! If you are lucky enough to find a copy snatch it up for any child or just for your self!
